import numpy as np
xs = np.linspace(0, 2*np.pi, 8)
ys = np.sin(xs)
points = [(float(x), float(y)) for x,y in zip(xs, ys)]
print(points)
points

import math
xs = [i*(2*math.pi)/7 for i in range(8)]
ys = [math.sin(x) for x in xs]
points = [{'x': x, 'y': y} for x,y in zip(xs, ys)]
points
